input.text: Hi. Spiky here. In this video I'm going to setup my project structure I will be using throughout these whole video series. I will use my freshly installed Ubuntu machine for this. You can click the link that is popping up now for a video about that. You can find all bash commands and project sources at my GitHub page. In a folder with the same name as this video. In this video you see me cut and paste all commands from my GitHub page directly into an Ubuntu terminal. I will try to explain at each step, what exactly we are doing. Let's go!
